languages.text: "Пешка, бездумный инструмент. Ему промыли мозги и подчинили разум. Он даже не является распространителем идеологии, ему скормили лишь основы, не доверив ничего важного, и отправили служить и умирать".

"This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."
languages.original_text: "Пешка, бездумный инструмент. Ему промыли мозги и подчинили разум. Он даже не является распространителем идеологии, ему скормили лишь основы, не доверив ничего важного, и отправили служить и умирать".

languages.text: «Es un peón; una herramienta obediente. Le lavaron el cerebro y le obligaron a obedecer. Ni siquiera extiende su ideología: le dieron las bases y le enviaron a servir y a morir sin confiarle nada de importancia».
languages.original_text: "This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."

traits.locale_text: «Es un peón; una herramienta obediente. Le lavaron el cerebro y le obligaron a obedecer. Ni siquiera extiende su ideología: le dieron las bases y le enviaron a servir y a morir sin confiarle nada de importancia».

languages.text: 「コレは駒であり、心を持たない道具です。洗脳され、服従させられている。イデオロギーをまき散らすような者ではなく、ただ初歩的なことを教え込まれただけで、重要なことは何も任されず、任務を果たして死ぬために送り込まれたのです」
languages.original_text: "This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."

traits.locale_text: 「コレは駒であり、心を持たない道具です。洗脳され、服従させられている。イデオロギーをまき散らすような者ではなく、ただ初歩的なことを教え込まれただけで、重要なことは何も任されず、任務を果たして死ぬために送り込まれたのです」

languages.text: “他只不过是个走卒，是个没有头脑的工具。他遭到了洗脑，无条件服从命令。他只被灌输了最基本的东西，重要的事情没有任何了解，甚至连传播教义的资格都没有。这个人就是个用完就扔的家伙。”
languages.original_text: "This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."

traits.locale_text: “他只不过是个走卒，是个没有头脑的工具。他遭到了洗脑，无条件服从命令。他只被灌输了最基本的东西，重要的事情没有任何了解，甚至连传播教义的资格都没有。这个人就是个用完就扔的家伙。”

languages.text: "Das ist eine Marionette, ein hirnloses Werkzeug. Er wurde einer Gehirnwäsche unterzogen und zum Gehorsam gezwungen. Er verbreitet nicht einmal die Ideologie, ihm wurden lediglich die Rudimente eingebläut, jedoch nichts Wichtiges anvertraut, und dann wurde er ausgeschickt, um zu dienen und zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine Marionette, ein hirnloses Werkzeug. Er wurde einer Gehirnwäsche unterzogen und zum Gehorsam gezwungen. Er verbreitet nicht einmal die Ideologie, ihm wurden lediglich die Rudimente eingebläut, jedoch nichts Wichtiges anvertraut, und dann wurde er ausgeschickt, um zu dienen und zu sterben."

languages.text: « Ce n'est qu'un pion, un instrument décérébré. On lui a infligé un lavage de cerveau pour mieux le réduire en esclavage. Ce n'est même pas un prosélyte, on lui a simplement farci le crâne de fadaises, sans lui confier quoi que ce soit d'important, avant de l'envoyer au casse-pipe. »
languages.original_text: "This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est qu'un pion, un instrument décérébré. On lui a infligé un lavage de cerveau pour mieux le réduire en esclavage. Ce n'est même pas un prosélyte, on lui a simplement farci le crâne de fadaises, sans lui confier quoi que ce soit d'important, avant de l'envoyer au casse-pipe. »

languages.text: "Bu adam, bir piyondan ibaret. Kafasız bir aracın teki. Beyni yıkanmış ve itaate zorlanmış. İdeolojiyi yaymaktan bile anlamıyor. Tek yaptığı, temel bilgileri anlatıp durmak. Ona önemli bir vazifede güvenmedikleri için de onu hizmet edip ölmeye göndermişler."
languages.original_text: "This is a pawn, a mindless tool. He was brainwashed and forced into submission. He is not even a distributor of ideology, he was merely fed the rudiments, and, without trusting him with anything important, they sent him out to serve and die."
